DOC.brief_summary: The goal project test effectiveness computer-facilitated alcohol screen brief intervention ( c-ASBI ) system 12- 18-year-old primary care patient multi-site , randomized comparative effectiveness trial . The investigator hypothesize , among 12- 18-year old patient come annual well-care , receive c-ASBI low rate alcohol use 3- , 6- , 12-month follow-up compare Treatment As Usual ( TAU ) .
DOC.brief_title: Trial Computerized SBI Reduce Teen Alcohol Use
DOC.detailed_description: The Specific Aims 1 ) Test effect c-ASBI alcohol use ; 2 ) Test effect c-ASBI separately prevention , therapeutic , risk-reduction intervention ; 3 ) Test effect c-ASBI separately cannabis tobacco use ; explore effect drug use ; 4 ) Assess potential moderator ( e.g. , age , gender , race/ethnicity , substance use history +/- , parent/sibling/peer substance use ) , mediator ( e.g. , Youth Provider Connectedness,20 perceive harmfulness alcohol drug use ) , explore c-ASBI 's mechanism action .
